tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE location_data (
 tower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tower_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 latitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
 longitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
 equipment_id INT,
 equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_data (
 equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 equipment_name VARCHAR(100),
 tower_id INT,
 status VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (tower_id) REFERENCES telecommunication_towers(tower_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tower_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tower_id) REFERENCES TelecommunicationTowers(tower_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    tower_id INT NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (tower_id) REFERENCES TelecommunicationTowers(tower_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkCoverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tower_id INT NOT NULL,
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    coverage_percentage FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (tower_id) REFERENCES TelecommunicationTowers(tower_id)
);
